website_summaries.verdict: Chewy jerky treats with quality ingredients that can be fed to cats and dogs.
pros: Contains no gluten, corn, or soy
Small jerky size is great for cats and many also use as training treats for dogs
Cats love them and they're easy to chew
cons: Only good for 14 days after opening and only if kept refrigerated

customer_reviews.title: My dogs learned new tricks for this treat
customer_reviews.text: These snacks are teeny tiny nibs and hardly any are in the bag, but my dogs love them. I purchased them to shoot out of my Furbo while we were on vacation. But since we have been sheltering in place, these treats were just used as treats but my dogs go crazy when they see the bag. They are very expensive but effective as rewards. My ten year old dog learned new tricks to get this snack!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Small enough to fit in the furbo camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small—they're great for training and they fit in the furbo treat camera.
customer_reviews.author: hhgriggs

customer_reviews.title: Bag of Crumbs
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to feed any of these to our dogs since the bag was loose crumbs. Very over priced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: White furry mold
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 bags. Exp date Jan 2019. I received them within the last week. Very disappointed that it had mold.
customer_reviews.author: avida

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on the recommendation of my new Furbo. My fur baby is about 70 lbs. this was recommended for large dogs. The treats are TINY and he doesn’t bother getting up to eat them when I use the app to give him treats.
customer_reviews.author: RACCAR

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different treats to try to motivate my Yorkie puppy in her training. This is the first one that actually has her clamoring for more! (Other than pecans, which are too fattening to use plentifully) Her training is going much better since I started her on these. And I know she’s getting good protein. I’ve been watching a training video by Jean Donaldson and these are some of the treats she mentions. I wish they weren’t so expensive but I will continue to buy them since they work.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: So hard and dry! Don’t buy from Amazon!!
customer_reviews.text: So mad!! What a waste of money!! It’s so hard as rocks!’ Can’t even break small pieces!! I usually purchase this treat from local pet store with the same price but much softer and moisture. My Baby (5yrs old chihuahua) keeps spitting out. She can’t even chew. Is there any refund or replace option?
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Product not what I expected as far as shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried product yet. Low rating is based on product will only last a few days in the fridge after opening. Once ready to use I will out of freezer and pull out what I need for training session. Pieces are very small.
customer_reviews.author: Carole S. Morgan's Point Resort

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved
customer_reviews.text: Great for training and our Furbo. Our dogs go bananas for these, and no upset tummies. They have sensitive stomachs with treats so that’s a HUGE plus for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shaltz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible. I basically received a bag of crumbs. I bought these because it was recommended for the furbo but it clogged it up and made the motor mess up. My dogs like them but I will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, Not Fresh Product — Hard and Dry
customer_reviews.text: Arrived hard as rocks. Dogs were unable To chew treats. Threw them out.
customer_reviews.author: thatsoalexandra

customer_reviews.title: Quality treat for cats or dogs, good for my cat's sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.text: I use the primal cat food for my cat. She has a VERY sensitive stomach and every other treat I've tired makes her throw up. She loves these and gobbles them up. Small sized bite treats (a little smaller then a dime) and great for cats or dogs! It's the only treat she gets now and she meows at the treat cabinet for them!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful to my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog won't eat any other snacks. He loves it and has for 2+ yrs!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kim

customer_reviews.title: My silky loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My silky terrier loves these treats!! They are easy to give and small enough to give a few at a time. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These pieces are too small even for my small dogs
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Important is the freshness of the food.
customer_reviews.text: My dog love it but my last delivery was at least 4 days before it came plus they were mostly crumbs it’s not like before that the pellets are not broken it seemed old.
customer_reviews.author: Julieta legarda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Treat!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog and her little friend next door love these. I have been buying Chicken Nibs for several years now, and the quality is always consistent. I only buy the best for my girl and this treat is one the top of the list.
customer_reviews.author: LoyalDogMomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Training Treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats and they are the perfect size. The quantity of treats in the bag is surprising.
customer_reviews.author: Sev A

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality treat
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog loves these nibs. Careful if ordering for a small dog to order the nibs and not the chips (they are about the size of a toddlers hand), these are perfectly sized, in fact I cut them up for her as she has lost many of her teeth. Good Quality treat.
customer_reviews.author: Mokie Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to give to my yorkies without being scared of ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to give to my yorkies without being scared of them choking they are a perfect size for these little ones one is 1lb the other is 6lb and a picky eater
customer_reviews.author: nohemi

customer_reviews.title: Good treat
customer_reviews.text: I get these treats for my dog. He’s very finicky but he does love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Garza

customer_reviews.title: Primal is love.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that Primal is a great product. I have been buying the Nibs and Chips for several years. I had a hard time finding a treat that was not made in China. My Max a five year old Maltese loves them. It's all about love.
customer_reviews.author: E Jean Graham

customer_reviews.title: Stale treats!
customer_reviews.text: These treats were BEYOND stale- I would like to get a refund or an exchange-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product was hard dry and broken. Non returnable. Not worth the money. It was a recommendation from Furbo, I'm going to let them know it was not a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging could be better
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes them, but the zipper on the bag broke immediately and I didn’t notice until they had already dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shredded
customer_reviews.text: It was shredded pieces they went everywhere it was a big mess in the Furbo
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo A. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love em but note that it says to refrigerate them ...
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love em but note that it says to refrigerate them after opening. I ended up throwing out two of these costly treats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dogs need treats too
customer_reviews.text: before they changed the packaging they were great treats however since going purple, they smell rancid. Might just be the one bag.
customer_reviews.author: jeff money

customer_reviews.title: Picky Eater Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 year poodle mix is a very picky eater but absolutely loves these. It's hard to find in stores so we will be reordering soon.
customer_reviews.author: GinnyTscuba

customer_reviews.title: My Golden Doodle, is crazy for these.
customer_reviews.text: My Golden Doodle,is crazy for these. His name is not given for privacy reasons
customer_reviews.author: language lover

customer_reviews.title: Still a great healthy treat
customer_reviews.text: Upped the price made the quantity less. Still a great healthy treat.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this treat since the green bags price increased.
customer_reviews.author: lianne kanamu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training as a reward
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. Perfect for training as a reward.
customer_reviews.author: luvurpom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie loves these treats! Just the right size for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and I don’t feel bad giving them to her!
customer_reviews.author: Jody G.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive treat.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff, only 3 stars because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: She has such bad allergies but this product does not bother her
customer_reviews.text: Our family dog loves this treat. She has such bad allergies but this product does not bother her. The product comes in quick when we order it.
customer_reviews.author: Corina

product_meta.title: Primal Organic Chicken Nibs
product_meta.description: Size:One sizeAll Primal Treats are made from single source proteins and offer a healthy choice for all pets, especially those with food allergies. Our treats are produced using low-temperature, slow cooking techniques such as freeze-drying and slow roasting, yielding high-density nutrition in a shelf-stable product. We recommend using our treats as a snack alternative, as well as for training and obedience rewards.
feature_bullets: All Primal Treats Are Produced Using Usda Meats, Poultry And Game Raised In The United States Or New Zealand Without Antibiotics Or Added Hormones
All Primal Treats Are Single Source Proteins And Offer A Healthy Choice For All Pets, Especially Those With Food Allergies
We Recommend Our Treats To Be Used As A Snack Alternative, As Well As For Training And Obedience Rewards
